name: Verify the renaming of the 'documents' to 'Agency worker Documents' when logged in as a client user.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user
When:
  • On the side navigation menu. 
Then:
  • Verify that there is a menu option called 'Agency Worker Documents'.
  • This option will appear after the timesheet option on the side menu. 
  • Verify that there is no option called 'Documents'.
justification: UI text change verification, low complexity and limited business impact.

name: Verify that the permission ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' exits when creating / editing a new Neuven user.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven user
When :
  • Creating or editing another Neuven user 
Then :
On the user list details screen search for neuven users
  • Select to edit a neuven user > go to the permissions tab and clarify that there is a permission called ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers'. 
  • Select to create a new neuven user and verify that the permission ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers ' appears as an option.
justification: Verifies critical security-related permissions, impacting user roles and access control.

name: Verify that as a neuven user with the permission ; ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' selected the menu options have changed.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers' permission selected. 
When :
  • On the side menu option 
Then :
  • Under the client menu option they should be able to see an option for Direct Bank Workers.
  • This should redirect the user to as page where they can edit / add and view direct bank workers details.
justification: Ensures menu options and access control are correctly applied, impacting user experience and security.

name: Verify that the permission for  “Manage Direct Bank Workers” does not appear when creating /editing Agency Users.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a neuven user. 
When:
  • On the user lists page. 
Then :
  • Search for an agency user and edit them > in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
  • Create a new agency user  and  in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
justification: Important for ensuring permissions are accurately assigned, impacting security.

name: Verify that the permission for  “Manage Direct Bank Workers” does not appear when creating /editing Client Users.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a neuven user. 
When:
  • On the user lists page. 
Then :
  • Search for an Client user and edit them > in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
  • Create a new Client  user  and  in the permissions tab there should be no option for : “Manage Direct Bank Workers” .
justification: Similar importance as UNO-T366, ensuring accurate assignment of permissions for security.

name: Verify the addition of two new permissions when creating a Client User
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a neuven user.
When :
  • On user lists page 
Then :
  • Verify that when creating a new client user > the following new permissions appears on the permissions tab: 'View Direct Bank Workers' and 'Edit Direct Bank Workers.
  • Verify that when editing  client user > the following new permissions appears on the permissions tab: 'View Direct Bank Workers' and 'Edit Direct Bank Workers.
justification: Covers critical changes to user permissions, essential for access control and security.

name: Verify the access rights of the client user who has the : 'View Direct Bank Workers permission'
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user with 'view direct banker'
When :
  • On the side menu they should be able to see the 'Direct Bank Workers' option . 
Then :
  • User can view this page but is unable to create / edit any records.
justification: Ensures correct access levels, a significant security-related function impacting business workflows.

name: Verify the access rights of the client user who has the : 'Edit Direct Bank Workers' permission.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user with 'view direct banker'
When :
  • On the side menu they should be able to see the 'Direct Bank Workers' option . 
Then :
  • User can view this page and can to create / edit records.
justification: High-priority check for edit permissions, crucial for maintaining data integrity and security.

name: Verify the additional to permissions set up as a client user (mutually exclusive)
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page
Then:
  • Verify that the edit and view bank worker permissions are mutually exclusive and user shouldn't be able to select both of them  when creating / editing a client user.
justification: Important for verifying mutually exclusive permissions, ensuring robust user role management.

name: Verify that as a Neuven user (with relevant permissions) can view the ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker' on the Direct bank worker page.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven user with  Venneu access and ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ permission
When :
  • On the direct Bank Workers page. 
Then :
  • User can view a button to add a 'Add New Direct Bank Worker'
  • When clicked on this redirects the user to an input page.
justification: Checks critical user functionality but limited in scope to accessing new page without deeper integration checks.

name: Verify that as a client user with 'Edit Direct Bank Worker' permission they can see the button to add the worker on the direct back workers page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'Edit direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should be able to see a button called 'Add New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen.
justification: Ensures UI elements are accessible according to permissions, essential for user experience and security.

name: Verify that as a client user with 'VIEW Direct Bank Worker' permission they can NOT see the button to add the worker on the direct back workers page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'View direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should  NOT be able to see a button called 'Add New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen
justification: Ensures UI elements are hidden based on permissions, essential for security and user experience.

name: Verify that as a Neuven user (with relevant permissions) can view the ‘Upload New Direct Bank Worker' on the Direct bank worker page.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven user with  Venneu access and ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ permission
When :
  • On the direct Bank Workers page. 
Then :
  • User can view a button to add a 'Upload New Direct Bank Worker'
justification: Similar to UNO-T372, focuses on the visibility of critical functionality based on permissions.

name: Verify that as a client user with 'Edit Direct Bank Worker' permission they can see the button to Upload the worker on the direct back workers page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'Edit direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should be able to see a button called 'Upload New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen.
justification: Ensures critical upload functionality is accessible based on permissions, impacts data management processes.

name: Verify that as a client user with 'VIEW Direct Bank Worker' permission they can NOT see the button to Upload the worker on the direct back workers page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client with the 'View direct  bank worker' permission.
When :
  • On the direct bank worker page. 
Then :
  • User should  NOT be able to see a button called 'Upload New Direct Bank Worker’ on the top right hand side of the screen
justification: Verifies the absence of upload functionality based on permissions, crucial for security and access control.
